headline: How Could Live Nation (LYV) Be Reshaped by the Ticketmaster Antitrust Shake-Up at DOJ?
summary: In recent weeks, Live Nation Entertainment has been drawn into a high-profile U.S. Department of Justice antitrust case seeking a forced divestiture of Ticketmaster, even as the suit, initiated under President Joe Biden, continues under President Donald Trump’s administration. The surprise resignation of DOJ Antitrust Chief Abigail Slater, just weeks before trial, has sharpened investor focus on how shifting enforcement leadership could influence the outcome and Live Nation’s future...
